name: City Sniper:Crime Shot
description:
City Sniper:Crime Shot!!!
Show your fury and hunt for criminals. Be an expert city sniper in this best FPS shooter game. Sniper games are challenging but being a commando in this sniper free games battle against the enemy as the last hope of city survival. Pickup your rifle and battle against the terrorist trying to bring down the city with their criminal activities. Aim perfectly before you begin the shooting battle game against the criminals. Mission games allow you to plan your strategy against the opponents.
Features
• Realistic Environment.
• Thrilling action levels.
• New and latest Sniper 3D Guns.
• High quality graphics and best sound effects
• HD Graphics.
